summary: The diff shows that REQ-1 has been successfully implemented. The background color of the element at the specified XPath (/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[2]) was changed to light blue using the Tailwind CSS utility class 'bg-blue-100'. The change is correctly scoped to only the targeted element (the header section containing 'Your Habits' title and description) without affecting other elements or the overall color scheme.
